pricing_discussions.customer_position: Preferred OPEX model for financial sense and maintenance support
pricing_discussions.resolution: Negotiated to 799 monthly with a 3-year warranty

objection_responses.objection: Cost and terms need to be right due to other expenses like parking lot and air conditioning
objection_responses.response_given: Negotiated a lower price with a 3-year warranty and emphasized the value of the robot

roi_discussions.savings_argument: Potential to save on labor costs and extend court life
roi_discussions.customer_reaction: Agreed it aligns with their labor cost expectations

closing_triggers.trigger: Being the first in Illinois market and marketing partnership

negotiation_outcomes.next_steps: Sign paperwork this week and schedule implementation before September

_source: Pickledilly Green Light Chat Cleaning Automation.pdf
